api_list.name: Return Tarot cards with certain amounts of Minor and Major
api_list.description: `?major=N&minor=M` -- this will return N major arcanas and M minor arcanas

api_list.name: Return Minor Arcana
api_list.description: `?minor=N` -- this will return only Minor arcanas equal to N

api_list.name: Return Major Arcana
api_list.description: `?major=N` -- this will return only Major arcanas equal to N

api_list.name: Return Tarot Card
api_list.description: `?amount=N` -- this will return a mix of Major and Minor arcanas equal to N
